thig3.2:1.3_0: Failing to find peace of heart,
thig3.2:2.4_0: the elements of the sense fields,
thig3.2:3.3_0: I sat cross-legged for seven days without moving,
thig3.2:3.4_0: given over to rapture and bliss.
thig3.2:3.5_0: On the eighth day I stretched out my feet,
thig3.2:3.6_0: I shattered the mass of darkness.
